TopicTitle: Space Art using GIMP - Lastest: Eve Sunset

Articles.Content:
Hello everyone,

Since my previous space art thread disepeared with the Great April Purge, I post a new one with my last image:

My fan-art is on the Steam community too: http://steamcommunity.com/app/220200/images/ (all the Steam Art Works here, some are really good !)

Enjoy, and please feedback, and feel free to ask for special space art too !

can I use your art for you tube?thanks I`ll make sure to give you a shout out.

Edited April 24, 2013 by Spartwo
Of course you can! Just say it is me, or link to my channel (SolarLinerGames, witch is in French, but yeah).
